website_summaries.verdict: If you're looking for a shampoo and conditioner set to enhance your curls, the Marc Daniels brand is a winner.
pros: We love the chamomile scent of this repairing formula
Unique herbal blend is packed with amino acids to strengthen hair, while making it feel smooth
Perfect for women, men and kids with curly or wavy hair
Free of sulfates, silicone, and parabens

customer_reviews.title: So it's a very good product regardless
customer_reviews.text: My hair is getting greasier faster sense using this product, but it did enhance the look of my curls and my hair is less tangled then normal. So it's a very good product regardless, and I'll probably buy more.
customer_reviews.author: Sky Young

customer_reviews.title: It made my hair curly, but in a messy way. And not a cute messy way.
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted this product to work. It made my hair curly, but in a messy way. And not a cute messy way. The shampoo really dried my hair out so I didn’t even continue to use the shampoo. If you have oily hair then this product might work for you, but it didn’t for me. I was disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: McKenzie Chesney

customer_reviews.title: Very drying to my hair
customer_reviews.text: This shampoo and conditioner did help define my curls, however it made my hair very dry.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Works!
customer_reviews.text: Although it does not have any fragrance, it's still a great product. I notice a huge difference in my natural hair when I use it vs. when I don't. I'd give it 5 stars if it had a fragrance to it.. but over all it is great, and actually makes a difference in curly hair.
customer_reviews.author: karli daughtrey

customer_reviews.title: OK
customer_reviews.text: These are OK, but I need a deeper moisturizing product for my frizzy hair.
customer_reviews.author: Dusty Desert

customer_reviews.title: Good curls, bad oily hair
customer_reviews.text: This product definitely makes my hair more defined with curls. But it leaves my hair oily/greasy by the end of the day. I followed the 2x shampoo rule as well. If it didn't leave my hair gross before even 12 hours, it would be great!
customer_reviews.author: Leah Calder

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: I would not buy this product again, while it enhanced my natural curls, it completely ruined my hair! I have naturally thick and wavey hair. It completely dried out my hair, made it feel coarse and made my ends super split.
customer_reviews.author: Carey Ker

customer_reviews.title: Dried my hair out
customer_reviews.text: It dries my hair out. Yes, it will make wavy hair more manageable but to harsh for my hair type. Dang!
customer_reviews.author: Terri Linn

customer_reviews.title: Not that amazing
customer_reviews.text: Nothing that amazing; was comparable to cheap big name hair care products.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce S.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: When I used it for first time I noticed the difference
customer_reviews.author: Marlon carrillo

customer_reviews.title: Too expensive and not worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Takes a handful of shampoo to lather. Doesn’t have a nice smell to it. Didn't enhance my curls or reduce the frizz. Bought the set of shampoo & conditioner.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca S.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Dried my hair out so bad that I had to have 4 inches cut off. HORRIBLE!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My daughter really likes how this shampoo/conditioner makes her bi-racial hair curly and bouncy
customer_reviews.author: Staci F.

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: Made my hair a little greasy. Not sure what changed but it didn't agree with my hair
customer_reviews.author: Tammy H.

customer_reviews.title: Not so great
customer_reviews.text: Watery! No consistency and my hair is very limp with this.
customer_reviews.author: Farrah

customer_reviews.title: ... have tried glide through my hair and detangle it easily. Not this one
customer_reviews.text: i expect my conditioner to detangle my 3b/3c curls and most conditioners I have tried glide through my hair and detangle it easily. Not this one. I used a third of the bottle and needed the assistance of a comb. It's hard to "hate" a shampoo/conditioner. They all get your hair clean and it smells ok, but needless to say, I will not be buying this again and I do not recommend it for ethnic hair.
customer_reviews.author: Lanita

customer_reviews.title: Nice at first, then not so nice.
customer_reviews.text: I've used this shampoo and conditioner several times. It was great the first time or 2. Subsequent washings and conditionings left a ton of hair on the bottom of my bathtub each time. I cannot "afford" to lose handfuls of hair. So I won't be using or buying this product again.
customer_reviews.author: CrazyPetLady

customer_reviews.title: This product was terrible! My curls were dry and frizzy after using ...
customer_reviews.text: This product was terrible! My curls were dry and frizzy after using it and I never have that problem. I would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Connie Y.

customer_reviews.title: Love, love, love!
customer_reviews.text: So I’ve been searching for YEARS for a shampoo and conditioner that works well with my hair type, this is that product. I have 2c biracial hair, it’s usually very tightly curled near the root and loosen as it grows. It’s so hard to let it grow because of the tight curls at the root. They usually end up breaking off so easily. This product keeps me feeling like I just left the salon every time I use it. I adore it and suggest it to anyone with curly hair.
customer_reviews.author: Nerissa

customer_reviews.title: Smells great, Moisturizes and Defines
customer_reviews.text: I just had a baby 6 weeks ago so I was looking for a way to get maintenance products on Amazon subscribe and save... to avoid running out of everyday household items we would need. Very glad I tied this shampoo and conditioner! It smells awesome and feels so great on. My curls thanked me!
customer_reviews.author: Selle E

customer_reviews.title: Nicest shampoo I’ve used in quite a while
customer_reviews.text: I was a little worried about using the products as I am allergic to chamomile tea, I gave it a try (with Allergy Med close by) glad to report I had no issue. The fragrance is mild and I find it lovely. It makes my hair soft. To the person who has trouble with her hair seems to look oily faster, I use a dry shampoo and it works great for in between shampoos.
customer_reviews.author: Tootie

customer_reviews.title: Less Frizz and More Waves
customer_reviews.text: I have wavy frizzy hair and really love the results from this product. The shampoo doesn't create suds how I am used to, but I got past that when I saw how much less frizz I had after leaving my hair to air dry. My hair is softer and with restored shine. I also like how it doesn't have sulfates.
customer_reviews.author: prnica

customer_reviews.title: GOODBYE STRAW HAIR,HELLO SILKY MANE!
customer_reviews.text: My other shampoo was actually putting sores on my scalp. This Shampoo has eliminated all the hassles,Smells great,No sulfates, my hair is soft and actually stopped feeling like straw! Will definitely buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Don't think this is really for curly hair
customer_reviews.text: Smells good, but doesn't clean my hair very well. And the conditioner doesn't make my hair soft. If anything it got even frizzier. I tried using copious amounts of both shampoo and conditioner, and that worked better, but does not make it a good value.
customer_reviews.author: peach_basket

customer_reviews.title: Don’t even hesitate
customer_reviews.text: My hair has never felt healthier or softer. I’ve noticed my hair is a lot less frizzy and my curls are coming back. This set is way more affordable compared to other sulfate free and paraben free products and both the shampoo and conditioner smell amazing. I don’t want to use anything else from now on. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Bethany Meyer

customer_reviews.title: Worst shampoo and conditioner ever
customer_reviews.text: This is the worst shampoo and conditioner I have ever used. I followed the directions and shampooed twice, noting that even on the second shampoo I had no lather so I went on to conditioner. When I rinsed out the conditioner my hair felt dry. Offer I let my hair air dry like usual my hair felt like straw. I definitely will not be buying this again.
customer_reviews.author: JebohAmazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This has helped so much on my hair being frizzy ...
customer_reviews.text: This has helped so much on my hair being frizzy and breaking off! (It was so bad) but now it’s shiny and healthier looking will be reordering again for sure
customer_reviews.author: sabrina

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Shampoo and Conditioners for those with Sensitivities
customer_reviews.text: I buy this for someone with sensitives. Despite the light fragrance it is tolerable and leaves hair clean and soft. This is a great option instead of free and clear if you can tolerate the light fragrance.
customer_reviews.author: Legit Reviewer and Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Works for curly hair
customer_reviews.text: These work well to keep bouncy curls. For my fine hair it is best if I put the conditioner on first and let it sink in before I use the shampoo to wash my hair.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Marie

customer_reviews.title: great product!
customer_reviews.text: Makes my hair very soft and helps enhance my curls with no frizz. Smells good.
customer_reviews.author: dee

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money.
customer_reviews.text: This is the worst shampoo and conditioner I have ever used. I would not recommend this to anyone. It drys your hair out completely. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: hhutcherson

customer_reviews.title: availability for a long while
customer_reviews.text: great product. Plan on buying again after using it few more times.
customer_reviews.author: Elie Kassab

customer_reviews.title: Smells good and I don’t have to use potion-9 any more
customer_reviews.text: Man this stuff kicks booty!! Smells good and I don’t have to use potion-9 any more. Not that potion 9 isnt the most amazing stuff on the planet. i just have options now
customer_reviews.author: Shawn Bado

customer_reviews.title: It did not bring out any more curls but my hair is fine blond and wavy so maybe it’s better suited to ...
customer_reviews.text: It smells lovely...light rose scent. It did not bring out any more curls but my hair is fine blond and wavy so maybe it’s better suited to different types of hair.
customer_reviews.author: KK

customer_reviews.title: Bad shampoo and conditioner
customer_reviews.text: Did nothing for my hair or it’s curls except make it dry and frizzy. Not a very good smelling set either. Do not recommend
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Flat looking hair
customer_reviews.text: Didn't work for my curly hair. Didn't suds up and made my hair look flat. Not impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Juli A. Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: I used it, but it didn't do anything to my curls.
customer_reviews.author: Dana R

customer_reviews.title: Careful with the shampoo
customer_reviews.text: It smells amazing but I feel like the shampoo dries out your hair a little. Conditioner is amazing however.
customer_reviews.author: Ysamar

customer_reviews.title: But it does smell good.
customer_reviews.text: Not what expected didnt work on my daughters hair. But it does smell good.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Tunay

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Helped restore the curls in my hair but will leave your hair with a dry scalph
customer_reviews.author: Stephanieann

customer_reviews.title: My daughter and I tried this product and it did ...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter and I tried this product and it did not help that much our thin, frizzy hair. But, maybe it is not the product, maybe it is our type of hair or something that we are not doing correctly to our hair; therefore, my suggestion is, give it a try. After all, we all have different type of hair.
customer_reviews.author: Cristobal De Leon

product_meta.title: Perfect Curls Shampoo & Conditioner Set, Sulfate Free for Curly Hair, Anti-Frizz, Hydrating Adds Bounce & Shine - ProVitamin B5 Repairs Dry, Color Treated Hair by MARC DANIELS Professional
product_meta.description:
Go from frizzy to fabulous! Marc Daniels PROFESSIONAL Curl Shampoo & Conditioner instantly adds bounce, shine and definition to curly hair, giving you healthy, manageable curls. Sulfate free & silicone free. 
Repairs and hydrates curly and wavy hair from root to tip, locking in moisture to prevent breakage and split ends. Transforms dry, damaged curls into healthy natural looking curls.

Our exclusive professional blend of Pro-vitamin B5 promotes scalp health and encourages hair growth.

Chamomile Extract smooths and protects the hair cuticle, removing frizz and giving hair ultimate shine and curl definition.

Pro-vitamin B5 protects your hair from UV rays and heat styling.

Our gentle plant based cleansers, help remove harmful impurities from scalp and hair, eliminating the negative effects of pollution and chemical damage that lead to dehydrated, frizzy hair.

Ultra-rich curls shampoo and conditioner infuses hair with moisture, strengthening each strand and going deep into the hair cuticle to smooth frizz, without weighing hair down.

Both our shampoo and conditioner are 100% sulfate free, silicone free, paraben free, cruelty free and vegan friendly.

With every use, this daily shampoo and conditioner will give you bouncy, beautiful curls and waves. You’ll love the silky-smooth feel of your hair, as it immediately becomes more soft and manageable.

Marc Daniels PROFESSIONAL Perfect Curls Shampoo & Conditioner is designed for all hair colors, including color treated hair. Perfect for women, men, and kids with curly or wavy hair.

INFUSED WITH HERBAL BLEND AND PRO-VITAMIN B5. Our unique Herbal Blend is packed with amino acids to strengthen hair; smooths and protects the hair cuticle. PRO-vitamin B5 promotes scalp health and encourages hair growth
